context_left: It's also a reason why security vendors, like
context_right: , are increasingly relying on behavioral analysis when analyzing binary files.
_context_left: It's also a reason why security vendors, like
_context_right: , are increasingly relying on behavioral analysis when analyzing binary files.
sentence_left: This is of course a known limitation of signature based approaches and something that attackers regularly take advantage of.
sentence_right: Behavioral analysis doesn't rely on signatures or require any prior knowledge of the threat and is a key component in the Cloud-based APT solution that Zscaler [released](/20130917-zscaler-comprehensive-cloud-based-apt-solution.php) in 2013.
label: Zscaler ((US English)) is a cloud security company, with headquarters in San Jose, California. It offers a platform for businesses that move their data to the cloud, with employees who work remotely.
